Room.Name: Shrine of Corellion Larethian
Room.ShortDescription: This structure is a monument to the god, Corellion Larethian.
Room.LongDescription: The shrine shares a similar design with the traditonal Greek ampitheaters. Hundreds of onlookers are seen gazing towards the central altar, as if in a hypnotic trance, as the sacred invocation of Corellion Larethian is being performed by the high priestess.
